website_summaries.verdict: The sky's the limit for creative play with this colorful rainbow stacking toy.
pros: Can be used as a puzzle for younger children or for toddlers and older to make intricate designs
Measures more than 14 inches long and 7 inches tall
cons: Customers note occasional quality control concerns

customer_reviews.title: Just don't.
customer_reviews.text: I am livid. In less than 24 hours, my kids have broken two pieces. There's nothing sturdy about this, and I'm almost positive we received a knockoff. We own a lot of wood toys and have no problem paying for quality. The one we received is total garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Its a chinese knock off!
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was clearly a Chinese knock off. It did not have the grimms labels or sticker on the smallest piece. It came in a box that said "rainbow" with cats on it. Buyer beware, who knows what the knock off is made with, I'm certain its not to the standard of Grimms. The pieces were extremely rough and got stuck on each other constantly. They were different widths so they looked funky.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Not Grimm's
customer_reviews.text: Product was described as Grimm's rainbow stacker. Instead of the authentic made-in-Germany toy, it was a sub quality item made in China. See photos. Amazon refunded my money, but the seller, Softmusic, was not interested in satisfying me, the customer. Buyers beware!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Aschenbrenner

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, but...
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea. That’s why I was willing to splurge on this toy. I’ve heard nothing but raving reviews about this in every mom group ever. I have to say, I’m a little disappointed. It’s smaller than a sheet of paper, and the wood it’s made from is lighter than plywood. For 100$, I expected it to be much bigger and made of a much sturdier/heavy duty wood. If I had known, I would not have spent that much on this little toy. I feel that the price point is way too high. My kids enjoy it, and I like that the wood is stained instead of painted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Limitless Possibilities and Quality. Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a long time debating between a cheaper option and getting THE rainbow and have no regrets shelling out the money for Grimm’s. This is holding up well to my three rowdy children and all of their creative play. I love watching what they’ll come up with next when they get this out. My kids range from 13 down to not quite 2 and all of them love this toy. It was the biggest hit for Christmas. The wood is light yet strong and the colors are not a chippable paint. This is a toy that I expect to have at grandma’s house someday.
customer_reviews.author: K. Prell-Emmo

customer_reviews.title: Freakin love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy! My daughters have been playing with it nonstop for hours, they are two and four years old. This is something I can pass down to my grandchildren, it's such high quality. I also love that it is stained and not painted.
customer_reviews.author: Tabby Powell

customer_reviews.title: Made in China -- not Grimm's, a fake!
customer_reviews.text: This is not made by Grimm's. It's a mislabelling. A fake. It's made in China. They even tried to lie to me and say it was made in Germany, which the real Grimm's rainbow is not. It's a nice enough rainbow, but if I wanted a cheap knock-off made in China, I would have bought one for a lot less than $100.
customer_reviews.author: A. Beeson

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, Fragile Toy
customer_reviews.text: Our dog tripped over our rainbow less than a week after we purchased it for our daughter's birthday and the outer arc snapped. It was with the other arcs, so it should have been protected. In examining the toy, several of the arcs have been made over a knot in the original wood and the outer arc appears to have a softness or rot where it broke. We were devistated to read that a broken product should simply be glued and not replaced as we felt the toy's construction and not our dog's mishap was to blame.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Didnt hold up to my 4 yr old boy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this...but it just hasn't held up to my 4 year old boy. These first day we got it the wood got several dents in it. It's all dinged up. For the price I was hoping it would hold up. To be fair, my son is rather rough, but I imagine I'm not the only one with a rambunctious little boy. It also isn't as versatile of a toy as I thought it would be. I wish I returned it. Buyers remorse for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kayci Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Open ended Wonder!
customer_reviews.text: Just opened it and I am very pleased. I stretched out the rainbow and placed two little toys on it and my son has been playing with it since! Now he also wants to climb it but I don’t think it’ll hold up his weight so I set some expectations that we do not step on our toys. So far, it’s been a hiding place, a tunnel, a bridge, a cage for a tiger, watermelon slices, a puzzle and a balancing archway - this is only day one! I am glad I placed it on my wishlist and Amazon alerted me of a lower price. I wish it wasn’t as expensive but so far it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought sooner!
customer_reviews.text: My girls are 5 and 8 and play with these plus the grimm’s bocks and large rainbow every day. I love seeing their creations and imaginations take off. Luckily I have a 6 month old who will soon get to use them as well!
customer_reviews.author: ghproctor

customer_reviews.title: beautiful rainbow
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. It’s absolutely lovely. I am at that point in my life (and on my third child) when I finally can appreciate quality over quantity. This toy exemplifies that. It is expensive, it will always be. But I adore it much more than the plastic garbage toys that break constantly and get thrown in the trash over time. Cannot wait to see their faces on Christmas morning, and I look forward to purchasing more blocks from Grimm’s in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This was not a Grimm’s rainbow but an imposter instead!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Duganne

customer_reviews.title: We enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really understand why this costs so much, but we all so enjoy this. I gave my kids a talk about not sitting or standing on the arches, because I’m afraid of them breaking. They have tons of toys, but the kids (3 and 6) ask to play with the rainbow frequently. My husband and I sometimes play with it too. When not in use, it looks nice on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Zrr

customer_reviews.title: Endless Play Possibilities
customer_reviews.text: I think I was more excited to try this than my son! Not really, we were both excited. There's so much to do with this rainbow, really endless possibilities. Pure creation and imagination at work with this. I have never seen the smaller one personally but I think it was worth the price to get the bigger one just for easier manipulation for my younger children (2 under 2). I can tell this is built to last. Beautiful colors.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Konen

customer_reviews.title: I think I got a defective one
customer_reviews.text: I think I got a defective one. It has a big gap on the bottom so the blocks aren’t going to line up properly. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, functional free-play toy
customer_reviews.text: It’s one of the few toys allowed to be left out, we get tons of compliments and I am not sure who likes playing with it more, the baby, the preschooler, the big kid, or the teenager! Yes, it’s pricey for a toy, but I can already tell it’s one that’s going to last unlike so many others.
customer_reviews.author: Clarky

customer_reviews.title: Not heirloom quality or worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected for the rave reviews and high price - the wood is rough, pieces are uneven, stained rather than painted, looked played with when opened, and is smaller and less durable than anticipated. Definitely not “heirloom” quality and we are sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wayde

customer_reviews.title: The paint does transfer scuff marks from the darker pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: The paint does transfer scuff marks from the darker pieces to the lighter ones, but my 2 year old loves this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Reby Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 48 hours after falling from a height of 10 inches.
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for Easter. It was sitting on top of his little play tote, and it tipped over and fell on the floor and broke. It fell maybe 6-10”? Over a hundred dollars and it lasted less than 48 hours. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha C

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1 year old as one of her bday presents, she loves to stack so I thought this would be a great addition. Well, I was right, all 4 of my littles (1-12) love these. They're also top quality and will last forever. Worth the $100. I plan to buy the little people and the smaller set for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Came with black mold spots on it
customer_reviews.text: So disappointing! My rainbow showed up with mold spots on it! Aside from the gross factor, it’s also so ugly. I expect a lot more from a product that’s this expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Open-ended play in a high-quality product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality product; glad I finally sucked it up and spent the money on the real thing! Children and adults love the rainbow, and will last/play with for years to come
customer_reviews.author: Ambslynn

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed about quality and seller.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Received it with chips and dents. The parcel came in the soft packaging, that is totally inappropriate. About the Rainbow. As in many previous reviews this Rainbow had a curved base. Poor quality for big money.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandr Maksymets

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality level I expect for $129 toy!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I paid $129 for this. First it's made in Bosnia NOT Germany, the gaps are annoying, and it is a matte paint finish that does not have a nice feel to it. Definitely not the quality level I was expecting. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Can't wait to give it as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old for this coming Christmas so I have no idea how she'll like it. BUT, I had a blast playing with it when it arrived! It was very relaxing, same effect as a zen garden. I can't wait to see how my daughter likes it. Lots of ways to be creative. Like others have said, when still in the packaging, it looked crooked and misaligned, but once I opened it and straightened it up, it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: JenH

customer_reviews.title: Endless possibilities for open ended play
customer_reviews.text: We love this rainbow stacker! My 23 month old uses it through the day every single day since she received it for Christmas. It’s been tunnels, houses, ball run, waves, a playground for her dolls, a car ramp, a cave and so much more.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Very therapeutic
customer_reviews.text: Love Grimms wooden toys. Everyone plays with this toy: adult and children- si I keep it in the living room. Very therapeutic.
customer_reviews.author: Brunilda Trinidad

customer_reviews.title: Open the plastic wrapping!!!  It’s beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I first gave it 1 star because the cut looked uneven. Then I read a review to open it out of the package and the person was right. It’s beautiful! It’s not cut uneven at all! It looked like the cut was uneven in the package, but once you open it up it’s stunning!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Brady

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to look at and fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: I love Grimm's blocks...some slight imperfections (a mark on one color, blocks don't fit together perfectly) but I still think this is one of the coolest block sets around. My daughter is three and this keeps her attention longer than most other toys.
customer_reviews.author: MsT

customer_reviews.title: Get ittttt
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I think I’m partial because I’ve been wanting it forever! I wish it were a little more rough on the bottom so you could put it more ways but I love the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Grimm's Large Rainbow is an amazing open-ended toy!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our Grimm's rainbow! It's fantastic for building and my 9 and 11 year old use it alongside my 1 and 2 year olds! It's been thrown, stepped on, and sat on by the younger 2 and it's still intact and perfect!❤❤
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fun and lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Looks great and so fun for my kids -- many different eats to play with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent and Classic Toy
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these blocks. I have purchased two sets. This block set is a unique standout product. I initially bought one as a gift. And after seeing the set in action, I bought one for my child. I'm trying to limit "over stimulating" toys in our home, so I'm very happy when I find a product like this. Pricey, but worth it. Also, product tends to sell out quickly. I bought the first set, and when I went to buy the second, they were gone. Did not have an opportunity to buy again for 5 months!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: One of the best toys out there! My kids can do so many different things with this. Very open ended!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Missler

customer_reviews.title: Okay.
customer_reviews.text: Nice but I don’t like how the wood is rough and the colour marks out counter tops an floors. Expected better quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: A classic toy for all ages!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our 1 year old but our 15 year old loves them just as much! They are such a great open ended toy with endless possibilities for play. Quality is nice and colors are vivid while still allowing the wood grain to show, which I find beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Creativity
customer_reviews.text: These can really open up your kids imaginations with what you can do with them. Just google them online and see all the different things people have done with hem. My kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: mark posty

customer_reviews.title: The new one is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: The first one I got didn't fit together correctly. The yellow piece was warped. I sent it back and ordered another one. The new one is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Megabat

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to keep this because I love Grimm's toys
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to keep this because I love Grimm's toys, but I just couldn't justify it for the price paid. The pieces were rough, not sanded down so there were little splinters sticking out. Also, the pieces seemed really flimsy and bendy. The photo of the child sitting on it I think is a bit misleading as to its strength. The listing is for EXTRA LARGE but the label on the product says "LARGE". I checked Grimm's website and they only make this in small, medium, and large. Also, the sticker on the base reads, "Made in Bosnia" not Germany. The seller was awesome, had super fast shipping and great customer service. But I just couldn't keep this product.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much it’s such great quality it’s very strong my son stands on them all the time without a problem we love building stuff with them
customer_reviews.author: russell machado

customer_reviews.title: Over-priced toy
customer_reviews.text: Although the toy appears well built, it seemed to be about a factor of 2 higher-priced than it should have been,
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1 year granddaughter. Her 3 year old brother loved it as much as she did. Even the parents were entertained by building things the 1 year old could knock down. All in all a great toy the whole family seem to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Diaz

customer_reviews.title: BEST TOY EVER
customer_reviews.text: A great toy. I did think it would be larger so check the size before you purchase. The wood is painted but has no clear coat over the top, so it won't be smooth either. Other than that I have to say that this is the BEST TOY I have ever purchased. It is big and bright and has infinite possibility for fun. Well worth the investment, a toy that will last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Elocutionist

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly worth the money. My four yr old loves these, and uses them daily. He loves building with them, stacking them, building long tunnels for cars, a hide away cave for superheroes, everything. Look great. They are a bit rough feeling as some have commented, but I am not nervous about any splinters. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adelman

customer_reviews.title: It is straight
customer_reviews.text: Just have to take it out of the packaging sorry for jumping the gun amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: jae lee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but damaged
customer_reviews.text: I really like this rainbow, but for over $100 I expected it to be undamaged. There are dark scuff marks throughout and a big dent on the red part of the rainbow. It was clearly damaged before it was wrapped and sent. I will need to return it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This shouldn’t be as fun as it is to play with as it is, but it is.
customer_reviews.author: S. Randtke

customer_reviews.title: Good, but should be better.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has enjoyed playing with this the past few days. I love the endless ways to play! I am disappointed that this arrived with marks on some and how quickly it became warped. For the cost, I expected much higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Blackson

customer_reviews.title: Open ended play
customer_reviews.text: Though very expensive, I love that it allows for open ended play. The colors are very vibrant
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Small, but stunning
customer_reviews.text: I feel a little deceived by the picture of the young child playing on this toy, as it isn't very big (ESP for the price)... But it is stunning. The Grimm products are all so lovely and this one is no exception. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: UVaMLRN

customer_reviews.title: Open Ended
customer_reviews.text: The rainbow stacker had dirty spots and strong smell. I had to clean it in a soapy water.
customer_reviews.author: Mila

customer_reviews.title: Three stars
customer_reviews.text: Knocked Stars off because I was so happy to see it finally go on sale. However, the wood is rougher than I'd like and there are multiple places where the paint is chipped.
customer_reviews.author: Megan E. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase this Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love the flexibility this offers, they can stack it regularly or use it for imaginative play. Both my 18 month old and my almost 4 year old play with it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Mundy

customer_reviews.title: Fals hight measurements.
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as 14"x2.8"x6.8" which were the measurements of the Extra Large Stacking Arches. This Large one is 6.5" at best. Advertised measurements are false. It is Large not Extra Large and hight should say 6.5".
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: These look great, but way over priced for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous toy that is heirloom quality and can be used so many ways!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna K.

customer_reviews.title: they create structures that look like true works of art
customer_reviews.text: These rainbow "blocks" are absolutely stunning. Yes, they are pricey, but the quality and color saturation can't be beat. My children have had these for several years now and still play with them at ages 7 and 9. When they combine them with other Grimm blocks, they create structures that look like true works of art.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed and beautiful piece to look at, with lots of open ended play opportunities!
customer_reviews.author: Alan J

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, dirty, warped wood. Expected a much better product for this price. Toddler showed 2 minutes worth of interest.
customer_reviews.author: B&H

customer_reviews.title: My favorite thing I've purchased for my classroom
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing I've purchased for my classroom! The kids can use their imagination to create a variety of different things! Very sturdy and well crafted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: Looks and functions great, Wild kiddos already dinged it up quite a bit but that’s not unexpected with a wood toy
customer_reviews.author: NTL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great size and vibrant colors, kids love them and endless playing with them, really nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use this in my 3 year old pre-school class.
customer_reviews.text: The blocks are bright and well made. These nesting blocks foster creativity and the children love them. I have used them on a long mirror for extra fun. The children love to see their creations in the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: teacher

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: Do not buy based on photos!!!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: Do not buy based o photos!!! While I have no doubt that these blocks are sturdy and well made, there are several photos giving the approximate size to that of a 1-2 year old, with children lying underneath a tunnel or sitting on top of them. The size is actually more built for an American Girl Doll. Not sure where the larger blocks can be found. If you find out, let me know. (By the way, I complained of this very thing, and got sent a replacement that was identical to the first... apparently this size doesn't actually exist.)
customer_reviews.author: Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Anything for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: my daughter is 20 months old everything that we have purchased she just enjoys so much and to me that's worth it thank you
customer_reviews.author: Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful as a part of your living space
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful as a part of your living space. Most importantly my one year old loves it and her cousins, 4 and 7, had fun playing with it too. In fact they gravitated towards it over other toys.
customer_reviews.author: hoopla

customer_reviews.title: Warped wood doesn’t fit easily
customer_reviews.text: The prices are warped and get stuck within each other and do not slide into a rainbow easily.
customer_reviews.author: tammy gallup

customer_reviews.title: Need replacement
customer_reviews.text: First product had some damage and doesn’t fit together easily. Waiting for replacement. It’s a beautiful piece. Will update when I receive replacement m.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Waaay smaller than you think it will be.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, the reviewers who say say its smaller than you think it will be are NOT kidding. Very underwhelming. That picture of the girl sitting on it is very misleading. Was excited to give this as a joint gift to twins for their 2nd birthday, but it got here and I'm actually feeling kind of embarrassed. If it hadn't cost so much I'd give it to one and get something else for the other. Certainly doesn't look like it cost what it did!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie B.

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed in the size considering the price and pictures
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed in the size considering the price and pictures. The ad says it was extra large and they sent a large. It is a nice toy, so we decided to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary benson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks even better in person, I thought it was wider though?
customer_reviews.author: WM

customer_reviews.title: Love how versatile and open ended this toy is
customer_reviews.text: GORGEOUS! Love how versatile and open ended this toy is. It will be well loved and well used for years to come in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Betsey Reinsborough

customer_reviews.title: Excellent “Toy”
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous, open-ended toy. My kids have so much fun playing with their rainbow.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Wall

customer_reviews.title: and my grandkids really love all the Grimm's wooden blocks
customer_reviews.text: I, and my grandkids really love all the Grimm's wooden blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Eggen-Mona

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for color study, imagination, building and balancing. Another toy the kids play with every day.
customer_reviews.author: karen  Zilkie- Nana

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful blocks we think they are great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson who also has these in school. He can build so many things with these blocks. He just loves them. They are beautiful blocks we think they are great. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly entertaining for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Nice set even for younger toddlers. We like that they are "a little rough"... it allows for more stable creations.
customer_reviews.author: Music Man

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TOY!!!
customer_reviews.text: We got this toy for our 3-year-old boy for Christmas and he loves it! This encourages tons of creative and open-ended play. He would pretend pieces are bridges, or the moon, seatbelt, his smile, his frown, etc. and etc. He would also create objects by interconnecting the arcs lying on the floor -- like bugs, a cloud. Pricey but a great investment as this would surely outlast the noisy, plastic toys. I'm glad my boy loves this as much as I do!
customer_reviews.author: chogirl

customer_reviews.title: It sits on our coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in the family walks by and changes the configuration. It's nice to look at and fun to play with. Who can resist a rainbow..?
customer_reviews.author: 6billion1

customer_reviews.title: My son had so much fun making tunnels for his cars to go through =)
customer_reviews.text: This item is vibrant, huge and exactly what you pay for. My son had so much fun making tunnels for his cars to go through =)
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute and much lighter than I thought...which is great for the youngins. Doesn't balance as well as I thought but it will be fun for play.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Beware this is NOT the Extra Large Rainbow as stated
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this Grimms Rainbow HOWEVER the description states it's the extra large rainbow. This is NOT the XL. On the front of the Grimms packaging it even SAYS Large Rainbow. I would of never purchased it if I new it was just the large and would NOT have paid this price for just large. Grimms is wonderful, seller description is way off! Irritated.
customer_reviews.author: Jedi Momma

customer_reviews.title: Colors are very vibrant and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Best toy EVER for creative play. My kids love it (2 and 4).
customer_reviews.author: Mommy65

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kindergartners are having a great time with this rainbow block set. Promotes creativity!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler loves her rainbow! She is still getting the hang of it, but loves playing with it. It looks wonderful on top of her toy chest too!
customer_reviews.author: atl

customer_reviews.title: Creative Fun
customer_reviews.text: Our boys just love playing with this. Whether they're just trying to make it fit, balance it in many different ways, or use with the cars as tunnels, bridges, and tracks. They also make a tunnel for their play snakes or little mazes, they have a lot of fun and use their minds.
customer_reviews.author: Jlb02

customer_reviews.title: We love this set!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. Sturdy, well-made and played with daily. We love them! Grimms products are the best I've seen. Something you will keep out for display. I love seeing how she uses her imagination with these. I'm already picking out what Grimm's set we will get next...
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Powers

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed when I received these stackers, mostly because of the finish. It's too rough. I expected a waxed or oil rubbed finish. The size is a little deceptive too in the picture. Looks smaller in real life. It also shows a little girl sitting on them, but I feel they aren't sturdy enough for a toddler to sit or climb on. They could snap in half if played with too rough. Like others have said , they have to be put back just right or they don't fit in evenly together. For the high cost of these I expected more. Great colors and looks nice just on the shelf though
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as it looks in this picture. ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as it looks in this picture. The pieces don't fit together as well as expected, if some of the arches are turned the wrong way there are gaps in-between. Daughter still loves it. Huge tripping hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C.

customer_reviews.title: Creative
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice toy. I like Grimm's. My son is 1.9 y.o. So we are playing together
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana Ekindzhi

customer_reviews.title: The blocks are beautiful and my preschool class is thoroughly enjoying them
customer_reviews.text: The blocks are beautiful and my preschool class is thoroughly enjoying them. I thought they were a little expensive but it is a well made toy and I am glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stacking rainbow!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautful toy!! My daughter is 20 months and enjoys playing with it now and I know that she will for years to come. I love that it is wood as I am trying to limit the amount of plastic in our home. When we 1st started playing with the rainbow I though it was warped because it wouldn't stack right, but then realized that it has a slight uneveness to the arch on purpose. So there is only one way for it to stack properly.
customer_reviews.author: Cat N

customer_reviews.title: Pics were slightly deceiving!
customer_reviews.text: So, I like the rainbow. Also, it is exactly as described. I thought it was larger than it actually is due to the pictures shown of the toddler playing with it. I came back and read the dimensions, and it is correct. Just make sure you read the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. One for a gift to our preschool from my boys on their birthday (a school tradition), and another for our house. They are GORGEOUS! So bright, and look absolutely lovely displayed in their playroom. They love it! Stacking it into towers, making tunnels for their cars, bridges for their soldiers to march over, using the smaller parts as telephones to call grandma. It is such a great, imaginative toy for my twins.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. MKT403

customer_reviews.title: So colorful!
customer_reviews.text: Rainbows of fun for my girls! This is really great toy it's made of wood and has lots of vibrant colors. My kids have so many ways of playing with this beautiful rainbow.
customer_reviews.author: Dorisha Castro

customer_reviews.title: ... my baby and I have spent countless hours of fun.
customer_reviews.text: I can just say that my baby and I have spent countless hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent learning/exploring tool. My 6yr old grandson plays with this for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately there was a chunk cut out of the orange piece and we are very disappointed. Normally the quality of these products is impeccable, which is why we splurge on them. It is still obviously usable but half the reason we buy them is because they are so beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: VRD

customer_reviews.title: Love this toy
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy! It gets so much use. It has sparked an interest in building in my daughter who wasn't into it before. I was on the fence since so many wooden toys are attractive to me but seem to miss the mark with the kids. Everyone loves this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Grimm's Large 12-Piece Rainbow Stacker - Wooden Nesting Puzzle/Creative Building Blocks
product_meta.description:
The bold colors of this beautifully handmade wooden rainbow will fire your child's imagination and creativity, and provide hours of open-ended play. This amazing Waldorf-inspired multi-use toy for toddlers, kids and adults is Grimm's the largest rainbow, measuring over 14 inches long, with 12 colorful pieces. This wonderfully simple, yet versatile design has endless possibilities. 

Children will learn about colors, refine hand-eye coordination and motor skills, as well as expand their creative abilities, while being immersed in critical thinking and deep play. Stacking, nesting and building stimulates reasoning skills, essential problem solving activities for children. The tactile nature of wood and bright colors will stimulate both very young as well as older children. When not nested, kids can use the colorful arches as bridges, tunnels, fences, and any number of unique creations. The rainbow can be telescoped and stacked in a variety of creative ways. Use the arches as targets for marble games (look for both sizes of Grimm's wooden marbles!) The pieces can be used together or individually as bridges, tunnels, seesaws, fences, houses, doll cradles or caves. The possibilities are boundless! With so many uses for this heirloom-quality Rainbow, this is a toy that will accompany your child for a long time and will surely be rediscovered many times along the way. Grimm's aims to help children discover and develop their own creativity. 

Comes minimally packaged in clear shrink wrap. Size is 14.4 x 7.1 x 2.9 inches. All colors are water based and in accordance with EN 71, are harmless to your health and suitable for children toys. 

Please note: The rainbow can only be nested from one side. This adds another problem-solving element to the "puzzle" aspect of this toy: if the arch will not easily nest under the previous arch, it must be flipped over horizontally, and should fit from that side.
feature_bullets: This truly beautiful natural toy, made by hand in Germany, will stimulate children visually, mentally and creatively
Grimm's largest Rainbow is Giant! Cut from a single, solid piece of linden wood: Measures (in inches) 14.4" Long, 7.1" High, 2.9" Deep (compatible with all Grimm's Large Elements Stackers)
Versatile open-ended toy has many uses & inspires joyful imagination: It's a stacker & puzzle, plus pieces can be used as bridges, tunnels, fences, beds & more!
Rich, vibrant colors from certified non-toxic, child-safe water based stains (NO worrisome paint or varnish used)

Recommended for toddlers, kids and adults (from 18 months+) and also makes a lovely decoration on a coffee table or bookshelf. Consider other accessories from Grimm's that go very well with this 12-Piece Rainbow, including Rainbow Friends Peg Dolls, Small Dwarfs Dolls, Large Elements stackers, Giant Marbles, 35 smaller Marbles in a bag, Lavender Dolls, Flexible Waldorf Dolls, any of the 4x4 size building blocks, much more!
